content: I am currently an undergraduate student at Peking University majoring in computer science and advised by Prof. Baoquan Chen. My research interest lies in the intersection between deep learning and computer graphics. In particular, I am interested in practical problems related to computer animation. Meanwhile, I am interning at the Visual Computing and Learning lab at PKU and at AICFVE, Beijing File Academy.
summary: I am currently an undergraduate student at Peking University majoring in computer science and advised by Prof. Baoquan Chen. My research interest lies in the intersection between deep learning and computer graphics.
title: Peizhuo Li
